para.text: The points that the operator must observe when performing machine operation and maintenance vary depending on the situation. All possible points cannot be covered in the content of this manual. Operators and maintenance personnel must have a thorough understanding of the machine and must constantly be aware of safety and potentially dangerous situations when performing operation.
